title: Fill With Fear (2U56)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While you can spot The Balrog, skip the archery phase. Maneuver: Exert The Balrog to discard a ranged weapon.
Lore:	“He drew, but his hand fell, and the arrow slipped to the ground. He gave a cry of dismay and fear.”
Rarity:	U
